name: Tower of Heaven
description:
Tower of Heaven

is a solo-game where you play as an ex-angel who for Love, wants to break into heaven. It's in a collaborative choose-your-adventure-esque style, where the protagonist is asking you to help them tell their exploration of heaven that is both supernatural and mundane.

.

This was created for Wretched & Alone Jam and uses a tumbling block tower & a tarot deck to simulate the ongoing tension of the ex-angel's status in heaven as well as inspiration and prompts of what is unfurling in each of it's levels.

.

I hope you enjoy it!
